short_description_localized.en: Enjoy special savings at Hotel Caza during the fun-filled San Francisco Fleet Week.

description_localized.en:
Attracting spectators from across the globe, San Francisco Fleet Week is not to be missed. Honor our men and women in the armed forces by enjoying a parade of ships, exhibits, concerts, and special performances by the Blue Angels and United 777.

  • Offer includes two beverages from the Cocktail Bar.

For stay dates October 1 - 14, 2019. Offer based on availability. Blackout dates apply. Offer cannot be combined with any other offer or group/negotiated rates. Applies to new reservations.

image.name: hotel-caza-sa-francisco-fleet-week
image.alt: Hotel Caza San Francisco Fleet Week
